symbol.description: any string that should be used as symbol. Can also be the ISO identifier e.g. 'USD'.

decimal.description: define how the decimal seperator should be displayed.

thousand.description: define if and how thousand seperators should be displayed.

precision.description: define how many decimal positions should be displayed.

format.description: this property can be used to set the currency in front of the value and with which distance. %s is the symbol and %v is the value.
